Spell Energy: 2 Spell Slots: B0: 3; B1: 1; Ch5: 2 Spell DC: B: 12; Ch: 12
Spells:
Arcane Impotence (Ch3 Abju): R200' Target Channeler must use 5 Spell Energy to cast for next 10 rd (DC 15 Will 5 rd)
Lullaby (B0 Ench): R200' Creatures in 10' radius suffer -5 Listen and Spot, -2 Will vs. sleep (DC 12 Will neg) for conc + 10 rd

Message (B0 Tran): R200' 10 targets hold whispered dialogue for 100 min

Magic Notes:
Art Of Magic: +1 character level for maximum spell level
Blood Talisman: Reduces Blood-Syphoning Spell Energy cost by 1
Ignore Armor: Reduces arcane spell failure by 20%
Magecraft (Charismatic): Knows 3 B0 and 1 B1 spells/2 Spell Energy
Spellcasting (Abjuration): Knows 1 Channeler Abjuration spell and may learn more
Arcane Spell Failure: 15%
Blood-Syphoning: May spend 2 Spell Energy to have an attack deliver Vampiric Touch and syphon 1d4+5 Spell Energy
Death Knell: Touched w/negative HP dies, and self gains 1d8 temporary HP, +2 Strength, and +1 caster level, and 1d4 Spell Energy (7 maximum) for 10*target HD min (DC 14 Will neg) 3/dy
Deathwatch: R30' cone reveals HP state of targets for 50 min 3/dy; may spend 1 Spell Energy per additional use
Spell-Syphoning: Blood-syphoning transfers a spell from target to self; grapple allows use of target Spell Energy
